title: OrganAIzer.App
subtitle: AI-powered meeting planning and task management
description: OrganAIzer is a modern, AI-powered application for collaborative planning, execution, and documentation of meetings and tasks.

ready.title: Ready to start?
ready.description: Discover how OrganAIzer can revolutionize your meetings and tasks.

hero.title: Revolutionize Your Meetings
hero.subtitle: From chaotic meetings to structured success
hero.description: OrganAIzer transforms inefficient meetings into productive, structured sessions with AI-powered planning, real-time collaboration, and automatic documentation.

items.solution: AI automatically generates structured agendas based on your topics
Automatic protocol creation with all decisions and tasks
Intelligent task management with tracking and reminders
AI-based preparation with time planning and material collection

steps.title: 1. Plan
steps.description: Create an Assembly with AI assistance and define the meeting agenda

steps.title: 2. Execute
steps.description: Conduct structured meetings with real-time notes and task capture

steps.title: 3. Document
steps.description: Automatic creation of protocols and task lists after the meeting

steps.title: 4. Track
steps.description: Track progress and manage tasks until completion

items.quote: OrganAIzer increased our team efficiency by 300%. Meetings are now productive!
items.author: Sarah M., Project Manager

items.quote: AI-powered protocol creation saves us 5 hours per week.
items.author: Markus K., Team Lead

items.quote: Finally no more lost to-dos. Everything is clear and trackable.
items.author: Lisa S., Product Manager

stats.title: Success Numbers
stats.subtitle: How OrganAIzer.App can improve your work

integrations.title: Integrations
integrations.description: Connect OrganAIzer with your favorite tools
integrations.offer: We can build connections to your favorite tools and used applications. Request our offer.

security.title: Security & Privacy
security.description: We are building up our application OrganAIzer for your requirements. We would be happy to provide the Security & Privacy you are looking for. Request our offer.

technology.title: Technology
technology.description: Modern technology stack for best performance and security
technology.subtitle: Enterprise-Grade Architecture for Scalable Meeting Solutions

items.title: 100% Data Control

items.title: Unlimited Scalability
items.description: Cloud-native architecture grows with your requirements

items.title: Zero-Downtime Updates

items.title: Multi-Tenant Security
items.description: Isolated databases for maximum data security

architecture.title: Architecture Overview
architecture.description: OrganAIzer uses a modern microservices architecture for maximum performance and reliability

components.name: PostgreSQL
components.description: High-performance relational database with multi-tenant support

components.name: Hasura GraphQL
components.description: Real-time API engine with automatic schema generation

components.name: React + Vite
components.description: Lightning-fast frontend performance with modern build system

components.name: AI/ML Pipeline
components.description: Artificial intelligence for intelligent content processing

items.title: End-to-End Encryption
items.description: All data encrypted at rest and in transit

items.title: Zero-Trust Architecture
items.description: Every request is authenticated and authorized

items.title: GDPR Compliant
items.description: Full GDPR compliance with EU-based servers

options.title: Cloud (SaaS)
options.description: Ready to use with 99.9% uptime guarantee

options.title: Self-Hosted

compliance.title: Compliance & Certifications
